named-query.name: productgroup.getAll
named-query.query: FROM ProductGroupEntity p ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: productgroup.getAllEnabled
named-query.query: FROM ProductGroupEntity p WHERE p.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY p.priority

named-query.name: productgroup.getAllDisabled
named-query.query: FROM ProductGroupEntity p WHERE (p.enabled = FALSE OR p.enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY p.priority
